adverb.description: With reference to the outer surface or structure of something; outside.
examples: the antenna should be mounted externally, perhaps on the roof

adverb.description: Used to indicate that something occurs or comes from a source outside the institution, country, or subject affected.
examples: most exam papers are marked externally

adverb.description: Using a disk or tape drive rather than the main memory.
examples: all data that has been stored externally will be easy to retrieve
